MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Dolwen Road, Geulan Road, Bwlch Y Gwynt Road and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50PM on 3rd March 2021.
